Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Client.Communication

Class RMICommunicationProtocol

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Client.Communication.RMICommunicationProtocol
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommunicationProtocol, Serializable, Remote
public class RMICommunicationProtocol extends UnicastRemoteObject implements CommunicationProtocol, Serializable
The RMICommunicationProtocol class represents an implementation of the CommunicationProtocol interface using the RMI (Remote Method Invocation) protocol for communication between the client and server. It extends the UnicastRemoteObject class to enable remote object communication, and implements the Serializable interface for object serialization.
See Also:
